Interface ec.meta.ClaLoader

public interface interface ClaLoader
This is the approved replacement interface for ClassLoader.

loadClass(String)
Load (if necessary) and return the class with the given name.

loadClass 
 public abstract Cla loadClass(String name)
Load (if necessary) and return the class with the given name. In addition to fully-qualified class names (such as "ec.meta.ClaLoader"), one can prefix such a name with a number of open square brackets ("[") to indicate an array of that many dimensions, or one may simply name the primitive types ("int", "boolean", etc.) to get a Cla to represent them.

Parameters:
name - the name of the class to load
Returns:
the class or null if there is no such class
